DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Patients endometrial carcinoma diagnose endometrial biopsy dilation curettage undergo full surgical staging ; stage , grade histologic subtypes eligible . Patients must suitable candidate surgery . Patients may also enter GOG2222 ( LAP2 ) . Patients sign approve Informed Consent . Patients meet preentry requirement specify Study Parameters . Patients prior malignancy ( least 5 year since diagnosis ) current evidence disease . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Patients consider suitable candidate surgery . Patients prior retroperitoneal surgery . Patients receive prior pelvic abdominal radiation therapy . Patients pregnant .
